basics.name: Adam Kaniasty
basics.label: Data Scientist & AI Engineer
basics.summary: Co-Founder and CTO of APPI, passionate about AI, ML, and building AI-driven solutions for real-world problems.

work.name: APPI
work.summary: Leading AI-driven projects focused on Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and deploying NLP models for the construction and architecture industries.
highlights: Integrated GPT models into web apps

work.name: Nokia
work.position: Working Student / ML Engineer / Software Developer
work.summary: Worked on Kubernetes pod autoscaling using RL models, developed NLP-based applications, and contributed to CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins.
highlights: Used TensorFlow, LangChain, Pinecone for NLP solutions

projects.name: APPI Synapse
projects.summary: An internal tool for information retrieval using RAG techniques, developed for the architecture and construction industries.
highlights: Leveraged LlamaIndex and LangChain for document processing

projects.name: APPI Marketplace
projects.summary: AI-driven expert marketplace web app with fine-tuned GPT models for context-based responses and knowledge discovery.

projects.name: Terrain Segmentation Models
projects.summary: Developed terrain segmentation models for the CanSat competition using PyTorch and transfer learning with ResNet12.

awards.title: CanSat Finalist
awards.summary: Finalist in the CanSat competition for developing terrain segmentation models using PyTorch.
